data.name: Neural Networks And Deep Learning: Cobalt Readable
data.description: Based on this existing style for the same website, I liked the easily-readable format but really enjoy the cobalt2 color scheme. I kept most of the styling and just changed the colour scheme to be white on a cobalt background, with deep yellow links.
